The video retweeted by Trump: which promoted hydroxychloroquine as a cure for COVID-19, was from a press conference held by a group called "America's Frontline Doctors" in front of the US Supreme Court.
The press conference was supported by a: 3. Dr. Stella Immanuel, a Houston-based physician, claimed during the press conference that she had successfully treated over 350 COVID-19 patients using hydroxychloroquine, zinc, and Zithromax.
Medical experts: including Dr. Julian Leibowitz, Dr. Shelley Payne, and Dr. Benjamin Neuman, stated that there is no evidence to support the claim that hydroxychloroquine is an effective treatment or cure for COVID-19. Multiple studies have shown this claim to be incorrect.
